testcase.name: should not fetch when user is not authenticated
should handle API response without success flag
should set error state when API calls fail
should clear error on successful operation
should handle file selection via input
should reject files that exceed size limit
should reject files with invalid types
should enforce maximum file count limit
should handle drag and drop events
should call onFilesChange when files are added
should show file preview for images
should display file icon for documents
should render development login interface correctly
should display all mock users with correct roles
should store correct user data in localStorage
should show proper role colors and icons
should disable buttons during login process
should not render in production mode
should redirect to home page in production
should render component with loading state initially
should load and display scholarship types
should display error message when loading configurations fails
should load configurations when scholarship type is selected
should show empty state when no configurations exist
should open create dialog when create button is clicked
should open edit dialog when edit button is clicked
should filter configurations by academic year
should refresh configurations when refresh button is clicked
should close error message when X button is clicked
should validate form data before submission
api and apiClient should reference the same instance
